patthana23.51:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.51:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.51:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naappamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
